Description: Fragement of neck of black-figure painted pottery situla. Lion catching hare: below, palmette. Purple on upper lip of lion and for blood dripping below belly of hare.
Curator's comments: The small breadth of the palmette suggests that this situla was dumpy (cf. Pl. GB 603, 5-6).
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B106.20.1)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 6) (Group C14)
Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxvi,11)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 254)
